pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compute Maximal Overlap Discrete Wavelet Transform (MODWT) and Trous Discrete Wavelet Transform // A lightweight package to compute Maximal Overlap Discrete Wavelet Transform (MODWT) and Trous Discrete Wavelet Transform by leveraging the power of 'Rcpp' to make these operations fast. See Maheswaran and Khosa (2012) doi:10.1016/j.cageo.2011.12.015.
